gameDetails.name: T.I.M.E Stories: Special Reward promo
gameDetails.description:
Contained in the Deutscher Spielepreis 2016 Goodie Box

Includes 3 beacon tokens

You may only use these beacons in the third run of a mission.

After entering a location, but before reading the "A" card, you may decide to use the beacon. If you do, flip all the cards on the location except those with state tokens or other special restrictions, and read them.

Once read, flip them back over and proceed as normal.
